entry.tran: 巴勒斯坦的；巴勒斯坦人的
entry.def: Palestinian means belonging or relating to the region between the River Jordan and the Mediterranean Sea which used to be called Palestine, or to the Arabs who come from this region.
A Palestinian is an Arab who comes from the region that used to be called Palestine.

means.word_mean: 1. a descendant of the Arabs who inhabited Palestine
2. an ethnic group of Arabs formerly living in Palestine
1. of or relating to the area of Palestine and its inhabitants;
